name: MKAnnotation
desc: An interface for associating your content with a specific map location.

items.name: var coordinate: CLLocationCoordinate2D
items.desc: The center point (specified as a map coordinate) of the annotation.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: The string containing the annotation’s title.

items.name: var subtitle: String?
items.desc: The string containing the annotation’s subtitle.
